no_message_desciption: Send a message to start a conversation.
let_others_scan: Let others scan your QR code to add you as a contact
qr_warning: This QR code contains a unique identifier. Do not share it with anyone you don't trust.
about_text: moo Chat is a revolutionary communication app designed specifically to help people in moo stay connected during challenging times. This app works entirely through Bluetooth technology, allowing users to communicate without requiring internet connection or cellular networks.
footer_message: Built with love for the resilient people of moo
no_chat_description:
You can start a new chat by 
scanning a QR code or adding a contact manually.
username_same_error: New username cannot be the same as the current one.
qr_code_scanner_description: Scan a QR code to add a contact or perform actions.
qr_code_scanner_error: Error scanning QR code. Please try again.
qr_code_scanner_no_permission: Camera permission is required to scan QR codes.
qr_code_scanner_invalid_format: Invalid QR code format. Please scan a valid QR code.
qr_code_save_permission_error: Photos permission is required to save the QR code.
qr_code_save_permission_denied: Photos permission denied. Cannot save QR code.
qr_code_save_permission_granted: Photos permission granted. You can now save the QR code.
user_blocked: You cannot send messages to this user because you blocked them.
on_bluetooth_disabled: Bluetooth is disabled. Please enable Bluetooth to use the app.
bluetooth_disabled_description: The app requires Bluetooth to function properly. Please enable Bluetooth in your device settings.
enter_user_details: Enter user details below to add them as a contact.
user_not_found: User not found. Please check the details and try again.
uuid_invalid_error: Invalid UUID format. Please enter a valid UUID.
contact_already_exists: This contact already exists in your list.
connection_error: Connection error. Please check your Bluetooth settings and try again.
uuid_hint: Flip your Qr-Code to get the UUID
message_unseen: @ has not seen your message yet.
feature_unavailable_notify_all_areas_tit: Feature notify all areas is unavailable
feature_unavailable_notify_all_areas_des: This feature can send notifications to all users in the area, but it is currently unavailable due to technical limitations. Please try again later.
feature_unavailable_send_voice_message_t: Feature send voice message is unavailable
feature_unavailable_send_voice_message_d: This feature allows you to send voice messages, but it is currently unavailable due to technical limitations. Please try again later.
feature_unavailable_send_file_message_de: This feature allows you to send files, but it is currently unavailable due to technical limitations. Please try again later.
feature_unavailable_send_image_message_d: This feature allows you to send images, but it is currently unavailable due to technical limitations. Please try again later.
feature_unavailable_send_video_message_d: This feature allows you to send videos, but it is currently unavailable due to technical limitations. Please try again later.
create_pin_description: Create a 4-digit PIN to secure your app
enter_pin_description: Enter your PIN to unlock the app
reset_pin_description: This will delete your current PIN and allow you to set a new one.
